channel.title: RegretX - Bringing back the Delta experience. -HD CLIENT
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i55.tinypic.com/29nzgcx.png[/img][/center] Hello, You might have seen the development page on this but I started the server over. Anyway.
[u]Updates:[/u] Added HD into client, only about 30% atm. Working on it more.
[u]Goals:[/u] 100% Flawless combat system Atleast 95% working lunar/ancient/modern magic. Real weapon special attacks (dragon claws, etc.) Unique server (creative ideas to make the server one of a kind) Changeable gameframe (377, 517, 562, Maybe HD?) In-game highscores (PK highscores) Updated character animations Updated weapon looks/special attacks (many more to come)
[u]Spots needed:[/u] Graphic art designers. html/php (website) programmers. Java programmers.
[u]Developers accepted:[/u] None yet.
Appreciation Form: [code]Name IRL: Applying for: Previous projects: Experience: Contact info: [/code]
[u]A few pictures:[/u] *soon
Blurr client. Delta based.
I will send you a PM if you are accepted.
Want more info? Post below, will add.

item.title: RegretX - Bringing back the Delta experience. -HD CLIENT

Hates gunna hate ;D Most are because it’s simply, delta.

item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Encryption, post:3, topic:411824”]Delta is shit, end of story. GL, though! :)[/quote]That was sorda uncalled For, All you had to say is something along the lines of “I don’t like delta, it’s not my preference, Goodluck on the Dev. Though”… Haters going to Hate

Read full topic

item.title: RegretX - Bringing back the Delta experience. -HD CLIENT
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

[quote=“Mayhem, post:1, topic:411824”][center][/center]
Hello, You might have seen the development page on this but I started the server over.
Anyway.

Goals:
100% Flawless combat system
Atleast 95% working lunar/ancient/modern magic.
Real weapon special attacks (dragon claws, etc.)
Unique server (creative ideas to make the server one of a kind)
Changeable gameframe (377, 517, 562, Maybe HD?)
In-game highscores (PK highscores)
Updated character animations
Updated weapon looks/special attacks
(many more to come)

Spots needed:
Graphic art designers.
html/php (website) programmers.
Java programmers.

Developers accepted:
None yet.

Appreciation Form:

Name IRL: Applying for: Previous projects: Experience: Contact info:

A few pictures:
*soon

Blurr client.
Delta based.

I will send you a PM if you are accepted.

Want more info? Post below, will add.[/quote]

Inb4, Java JUNK gets implemented into 1 Class

Read full topic

item.title: RegretX - Bringing back the Delta experience. -HD CLIENT
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:8, topic:411824”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=513079.msg3725186#msg3725186 date=1314218566]
Good luck with the Delta source, I’m quite in love with that source, reasons I can’t explain.
[/quote]I can! Cause theirs rarely ever a delta development anymore! And a FUCKLOAD of PIs :)[/quote]
But at least PI isn’t as messy and just nasty lol.

OT: good luck idc um try to rewrite the files and package them. Make the codes as efficient as possible, and it will be something unique, if you know how to.

Read full topic
